text: Se samasta loka, yara bale ye, allaha amadigake emana kona rasulera opara bisbasa na karate bale rekhechena yataksana na tara amadera nikata emana korabani niye asabena yake aguna grasa kare nebe. Tumi tadera bale da'o, tomadera majhe amara purbe bahu rasula nidarsanasamuha ebam tomara ya abdara karecha ta niye esechilena, takhana tomara kena taderake hatya karale yadi tomara satya haye thaka.
